subject: p13263843
History: Short of breath, assess for pneumonia.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest are provided. A focus of scarring in the right upper lobe is better assessed on the prior CT from. Increase in interstitial markings, which could indicate mild interstitial edema or atypical infection. Heart size remains stable. No pneumothorax.
Impression: Mild interstitial opacity could represent an atypical pneumonia or edema. Otherwise, no change.
